body_html: It would also be cool to be able to get the rotation matrices created by tf.contrib.image.rotate without actually preforming the transformation. That way along the lines of skimage.transform.AffineTransform these affine transformations can be chained together to get a new transformation matric.
body_text: It would also be cool to be able to get the rotation matrices created by tf.contrib.image.rotate without actually preforming the transformation. That way along the lines of skimage.transform.AffineTransform these affine transformations can be chained together to get a new transformation matric.
body: It would also be cool to be able to get the rotation matrices created by `tf.contrib.image.rotate` without actually preforming the transformation. That way along the lines of [`skimage.transform.AffineTransform`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/781#issuecomment-243181271) these affine transformations can be chained together to get a new transformation matric.
